channel.title: Open carry Laws [Self Defense]
channel.description:
[center]Ok, so right now I live in Wisconsin and our open carry laws are pretty much if it's out in the open it's legal. I'm going to be moving to North Carolina in a few months and I was wondering about their laws on open carry. I've been stopped by cops so far for looking odd carrying a sword (yes, I said sword) but under the laws it was legal and they let me go saying to just not scare anyone. This is what I was carrying. Anyone know the laws for open carry in North Carolina, it's more of a safty thing because of people I know from the past (grew up with a lot of gang related stuff that I got out of), I'm not carrying it to go slicing and dicing.
*Also for anyone asking, I have a thing about guns so I don't like them. Guns; one shot, you're dead or wounded badly, knifes and blades you get a cut as like fending something off.*
*27 Inches for this*
Thanks everyone. -Andrew [/center]

item.title: Open carry Laws [Self Defense]
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“Dunder Mifflin, post:40, topic:425958”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=528647.msg3856182#msg3856182 date=1324357454]

If you can get between $400-600, get a CZ American made handgun. Standard 9mm, 15 rounds, semi-auto and synthetic grips. It would probably prove more effective then your… blade. But if you don’t have the money I understand.

Wasting money and being trailed for owning a unlicensed gun, that does not would very good to me…

Well obviously get a permit…

I don’t like guns, that’s why I have this.
[/quote]

Thats sick. Youre like the modern day aragorn that carries around a sword. Swag. I wanna walk in school with a sword on my back and see hat people say[/quote]
Trust me, do not go near anything government owned with anything like that, they WILL tackle you.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“krackkid, post:12, topic:425958”][quote author=Dunder Mifflin link=topic=528647.msg3855610#msg3855610 date=1324335222]
I use my fists. Boxing + Football + gym = KO
[/quote]More like Bigmac + Fries + Gyro = Heart attack[/quote]
I"m sorry but that just made me spit out laughing lol

Ot, not sure about nc, but Cali allows concealed carries

Gonna keep a gun around maybe, cause I loves them + there are more crimes being committed (Blacks moving in too, coincidence? Not meant to be racist just thought I’d share that…)

And no I don’t learn my shit from cod if someone comes up to me with a knife I’m not going to take a m107 out of my ass and turn 360 degrees and shoot like 50 bullets in a second (I’ll be bruised for like a month + I’ll probs get arrested for hittin some1 else) but an actual pistol, not sure what pistol exactly though…

item.title: Open carry Laws [Self Defense]
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“chillwitm888, post:31, topic:425958”][quote author=Travas link=topic=528647.msg3855821#msg3855821 date=1324344273]

If everyone carried a knife, america would have a bloody civil war everyday.
[/quote]There’s a difference between carrying a weapon and actually using it.

Think about it, everyone is allowed to use knives
Those Ghetto people are only more tempted to use weapons upon force
Or think about People Losing Jobs and money

Just from a argument with a wife and husband
1 day the husband comes home and kills his children and goes after his wife

I think weapons should be authorized only by the government.[/quote]
Almost anything can be used as a weapon though, it’s better that they are legal and have to be registered so they know who has what. Other wise everything would be illegal behind the counter with unmarked bullets, people would still make guns and weapons.
